name: An Indie Game a Month: Unreal Journey
name_original: An Indie Game a Month: Unreal Journey
description:
This is early access to what will eventually be 12 different games included in this package.

The entry for January - Platformer "Brave Little Cat" contains 10 different levels with 2D and 3D platformer elements and a short bonus level.
The basic gameplay is jumping over obstacles, avoiding colliding with enemies and collecting 3 purple crystals that will allow you to be transported to the next level once you reach the Runestones.

2D Side scroller


3D Platformer


1 Short level of avoiding obstacles



I will be documenting my progress and sharing the blueprints of the games on my youtube channel, showcasing what a beginner can achieve and hopefully it helps more people to create games.
